layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x72
  LayoutBlockFlow {html} at (0,0) size 800x72
    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,8) size 784x56
      LayoutTable {table} at (0,0) size 598x56 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableSection {tfoot} at (1,29) size 596x26 [bgcolor=#00FF00]
          LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,0) size 596x24
            LayoutTableCell {td} at (2,0) size 295x24 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 247x19
                text run at (2,2) width 247: "This tfoot should have a lime background"

              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 247x19
                text run at (2,2) width 247: "This tfoot should have a lime background"
        LayoutTableSection {tbody} at (1,1) size 596x28
          LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,2) size 596x24
            LayoutTableCell {td} at (2,2) size 295x24 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]

                text run at (2,2) width 291: "This tbody should NOT have a lime background"
